org.spongepowered.api.text.title

Interface TitleBuilder


  • public interface TitleBuilder
    Represents a builder interface to create immutable Title configurations.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Title build()
      Builds an immutable instance of the current configuration.
      TitleBuilder clear()
      Remove the currently displayed title from the player's screen.
      TitleBuilder fadeIn(int ticks)
      Set the duration in ticks of the fade in effect of the title.
      TitleBuilder fadeOut(int ticks)
      Set the duration in ticks of the fade out effect of the title.
      TitleBuilder reset()
      Remove the currently displayed title from the player's screen and set the configuration back to the default values.
      TitleBuilder stay(int ticks)
      Set the duration in ticks how long the title should stay on the screen.
      TitleBuilder subtitle(Message<?> message)
      Set the subtitle to send to the player.
      TitleBuilder title(Message<?> message)
      Set the title to send to the player.

    • Method Detail

      • title

        TitleBuilder title(Message<?> message)
        Set the title to send to the player.
        Parameters:
        message - The message to use as the title
        Returns:
        This title builder

      • subtitle

        TitleBuilder subtitle(Message<?> message)
        Set the subtitle to send to the player.
        Parameters:
        message - The text to use as the subtitle
        Returns:
        This title builder

      • fadeIn

        TitleBuilder fadeIn(int ticks)
        Set the duration in ticks of the fade in effect of the title. Once this period of time is over the title will stay for the amount of time specified in stay(int).

        The default value for Vanilla is 20 (1 second).

        Parameters:
        ticks - The amount of ticks (1/20 second) for the fade in effect
        Returns:
        This title builder

      • stay

        TitleBuilder stay(int ticks)
        Set the duration in ticks how long the title should stay on the screen. Once this period of time is over the title will fade out using the duration specified in fadeOut(int).

        The default value for Vanilla is 60 (3 seconds).

        Parameters:
        ticks - The amount of ticks (1/20 second) to stay
        Returns:
        This title builder

      • fadeOut

        TitleBuilder fadeOut(int ticks)
        Set the duration in ticks of the fade out effect of the title.

        The default value for Vanilla is 20 (1 second).

        Parameters:
        ticks - The amount of ticks (1/20 second) for the fade out effect
        Returns:
        This title builder

      • clear

        TitleBuilder clear()
        Remove the currently displayed title from the player's screen. This will keep the currently used display times and will only remove the title.
        Returns:
        This title builder

      • reset

        TitleBuilder reset()
        Remove the currently displayed title from the player's screen and set the configuration back to the default values.
        Returns:
        This title builder

      • build

        Title build()
        Builds an immutable instance of the current configuration.
        Returns:
        An immutable Title with the currently configured settings
